translation: By devotion, he knows Me in truth, who and what I am; then, having known Me in truth, he immediately enters into the Supreme.
commentary: 18.55 Bhaktya by devotion? Maam Me? recognizes (he) knows? Yavan what? who who? f and? I am (I) am? Tattvata in truth? Then then? Maam Me? Tattvata in truth? knowing having known? enters (he) enters? That that? Afterwards afterwards.Commentary My devotee? Or Arjuna? who has attained to union with Me through singleminded and unflinching devotion is verily My very Self. Devotion culminates in knowledge.
